title: Gallipoli: The Anzac Legend
brief_description: The story of Gallipoli told by Robert Rhodes James, world renowned Gallipoli historian and surviving Anzac, and Turkish veterans of the campaign. Includes highlights of the 1990 return to Anzac Cove by Australian veterans and rare footage from Turkish archives.
